effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.

short_effect.x_y: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

flavor_text.x_y: The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and attacks by cutting its target. Critical hits land more easily.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and attacks by cutting its target. Critical hits land more easily.
